## hpr1953 :: An Interview with David Willson of the Software Freedom School

 David Whitman interviews David Willson of Software Freedom School

David Willson, founder of Software Freedom School, Denver, Colorado

Email Contact: dlwillson@thegeek.nu

SFS Website: https://www.sofree.us has updates for 6 months in advance
Linux Camp targets Linux Foundation Training https://training.linuxfoundation.org/
Oct 21, 2013 HPR 1361 - SFS and Linux Camp https://hackerpublicradio.org/eps.php?id=1361
https://zimbra.thegeek.nu/home/dlwillson@thegeek.nu/Shared/SFS/Linux%20Camp%202013/SFS%20Linux%20Camp.odt
SFS Method = Show and tell, then students work in pairs re-teaching the subject to each other.
Stuff is at https://www.gitlab.com/sofrees
Google Plus Community can be found here: https://plus.google.com/u/0/+SofreeUs
Find SFS at Twitter, Meetup, and Facebook
Mail list link and IRC link on https://www.sofree.us

Links

https://www.sofree.us
https://training.linuxfoundation.org/
